snippet: A federal judge on Wednesday sentenced a former State Department contractor to 13 months in prison for leaking information about North Korea to a Fox News reporter.
abstract: Federal judge sentences former State Dept contractor Stephen J Kim to 13 months in prison for leaking information about North Korea to a Fox News reporter.
lead_paragraph: A federal judge on Wednesday sentenced a former State Department contractor to 13 months in prison for leaking information about North Korea to a Fox News reporter.

headline.main: Ex-Contractor Sentenced for Leak to Fox News
headline.print_headline: Ex-Contractor Sentenced for Leak to Fox News
